rules: Rule1: If paper1 is accepted for publication, then paper1 is presented at the poster session.
Rule2: Either paper1 is accepted for publication or paper1 is rejected for publication.
Rule3: Under the condition that talk1 is moved to the breakout room, it is not the case that talk1 is rescheduled to the main hall.
Rule4: Provided that reviewer1 requires the submission system, the projector is tested.
Rule5: Under the condition that there is a technical issue with the submission system, the submission system is functional.
Rule6: Provided that there is a technical issue with the submission system, it is not the case that the submission system is accessible.
Rule7: Either there is a technical issue with the submission system, or if reviewer1 requires the submission system, then the conference is successful.
Rule8: If the submission system is functional, then the submission system is accessible.
Rule9: Under the condition that chair1 contacted author1, if paper1 is accepted for publication, then the conference is successful.
Rule10: Chair1 contacted author1 or chair1 emailed author1.
Rule11: Whenever paper1 is rejected for publication, the conference is successful.
Rule12: If notification1 is urgent, then chair1 called author1.
Rule13: Either notification1 is urgent or notification1 is routine.
Rule14: Provided that notification1 is routine, if chair1 emailed author1, then whenever paper1 is accepted for publication, the conference is successful.
Rule15: If issue1 is resolved, then it is not the case that there is a technical issue with the submission system.
Rule16: Under the condition that issue1 is unresolved, it is not the case that there is a technical issue with the submission system.
Rule17: If tech1 is assigned to issue1, then either issue1 is resolved or issue1 is unresolved.
Rule18: Either tech1 is assigned to issue1 or issue1 is escalated to the supervisor.

Rule19: If a projector is needed as a presentation tool, then under the condition that it is not the case that if issue1 is escalated to the supervisor then either issue1 is resolved or issue1 is unresolved, issue1 is critical.
Rule20: Whenever a projector is available in roomB, a projector is needed as a presentation tool.
Rule21: If av_team confirmed the projector, then provided that a projector is available in roomA, a projector is available in roomB.
Rule22: Either av_team confirmed the projector or av_team has a pending status for the projector.
Rule23: Provided that av_team has a pending status for the projector, if a projector is available in roomA, then a projector is available in roomB.
Rule24: If the projector is working, then the conference is successful.
Rule25: Provided that the projector is calibrated, the projector is working.
Rule26: Provided that a sound check is scheduled for the presentation tool, if the speaker system is malfunctioning, then the speaker system is fixed.
Rule27: If author1 is notified of acceptance, then whenever paper1 is presented at the poster session, the conference is successful.
Rule28: Either author1 is notified of acceptance or author1 is notified of rejection.
Rule29: Provided that author1 is notified of rejection, author1 submitted the camera ready version.
Rule30: Either author1 attended the conference, or if author1 submitted the camera ready version, then provided that paper1 is presented at the poster session, the conference is successful.
Rule31: If talk1 is scheduled in the breakout room, then talk1 is canceled in the main hall.
Rule32: Under the condition that it is not the case that if talk1 is canceled in the main hall then it is not the case that talk1 is scheduled in the main hall, talk1 is rescheduled to the main hall.
Rule33: Whenever it is not the case that if talk1 is canceled in the main hall then it is not the case that talk1 is scheduled in the main hall, talk1 is moved to the breakout room.
Rule34: Provided that it is not the case that if issue1 is escalated to the supervisor then either issue1 is resolved or issue1 is unresolved, it is not the case that issue1 is critical.

Rule35: Under the condition that it is not the case that if av_team is prepared for the presentation tool then if the projector is tested then the projector is calibrated, the speaker system is malfunctioning.
Rule36: If it is not the case that the conference is successful, then talk1 is scheduled in the main hall.
Rule37: Provided that it is not the case that the conference is successful, talk1 is scheduled in the breakout room.
facts: Fact1: Reviewer1 requires the submission system.
Fact2: A projector is available in roomA.
Fact3: Av_team is prepared for the presentation tool.
Fact4: A sound check is scheduled for the presentation tool.
Fact5: It is not the case that chair1 called author1.
Fact6: It is not the case that the speaker system is fixed.
Fact7: It is not the case that author1 attended the conference.
